body_html: @ibab: I mean unifying the two ops. The Python wrapper is problematic since we don't necessarily know which to use at graph construction time, so tf.cond would be necessary. The difference in attributes is pretty frustrating; @rmlarsen: did we have a nice conclusion as to which attributes we want?
body_text: @ibab: I mean unifying the two ops.  The Python wrapper is problematic since we don't necessarily know which to use at graph construction time, so tf.cond would be necessary.  The difference in attributes is pretty frustrating; @rmlarsen: did we have a nice conclusion as to which attributes we want?
body: @ibab: I mean unifying the two ops.  The Python wrapper is problematic since we don't necessarily know which to use at graph construction time, so `tf.cond` would be necessary.  The difference in attributes is pretty frustrating; @rmlarsen: did we have a nice conclusion as to which attributes we want?
